"}},{"type":"tabs","settings":{"note":"FAQs","title":"","desc":"Find answers to common questions about shopping at MegaMall. From payments and shipping to returns and discounts, we've got you covered!","id":"","class":"cdz-acco-base acco-01","custom_template":"Codazon_ThemeLayoutPro::content-builder/element/tabs/tabs-vertical.phtml","items":"[{"title":"What payment methods do you accept?","icon":"fa fa-credit-card","external_url":"","class":"","content":"We accept major credit and debit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), PayPal, and cash on delivery for select locations. Additional payment options may be available depending on your region."},{"title":"How long does delivery take?","icon":"fa fa-truck","external_url":"","class":"","content":"Standard delivery typically takes 3-5 business days, while express shipping takes 1-2 business days. Delivery times may vary depending on your location and order size. You will receive a tracking link once your order is shipped."},{"title":"Can I return a product if I’m not satisfied?","icon":"fa fa-gavel","external_url":"","class":"","content":"Yes, we accept returns within 14 days of delivery, provided the item is unused, undamaged, and in its original packaging. Some products, such as perishable food items, may not be eligible for returns. Please check our return policy for more details."},{"title":"Do you offer discounts for bulk orders?","icon":"fa fa-percent","external_url":"","class":"","content":"Yes, we offer special discounts for bulk or wholesale purchases. If you are interested in placing a large order, please contact our customer support team for personalized pricing and special offers."},{"title":"Is my personal information secure when shopping on your website?","icon":"fa fa-shield","external_url":"","class":"","content":"Absolutely. We use advanced encryption technology to protect your personal and payment information.
